text: In New York, the Trump Brand Is Costing Some Condo Owners  —  When Donald J. A year after Jimmy Carter's entered hospice care, advocates hope his endurance drives awareness  —  ATLANTA (AP) — Since Jimmy Carter entered hospice care at his home in south Georgia one year ago, the former U.S. president has celebrated his 99th birthday, enjoyed tributes to his legacy and lost his wife of 77 years.
